name: PREMIUMESTORE, LLC D.B.A. PREMIUM-PPE
sampleDescriptions: The lobbying will focus on bringing attention to the need for supporting small domestic manufacturers that are making large volumes of PPE in response to the COVID-19 crisis and PPE procurement policy
